text: Gen tte yaru ga i. `Mayotte iru mono demo jihibukai okata wa kare-ra ni taishi inochi o nobasa reru. Daga sore mo kare-ra ga keikoku sa reta koto o miru toki, tsumari basse rareru ka, soretomo (shinpan no)-ji ni naru madedearu. Yagate kare-ra wa, dochiraga yori hidoi tachibadeari, dochira ga yowai seiryokudearu ka o shirudearou
